tailoring.name: Priya Sharma
tailoring.story: Started with basic alterations from her home after learning tailoring skills through a government program. She focused on quality work and word-of-mouth marketing in her neighborhood.
tailoring.achievement: Built a customer base of 200+ regular clients and now earns ₹45,000 monthly while working from home, allowing her to balance family responsibilities.

tailoring.name: Meera Patel
tailoring.story: Began with a small investment of ₹20,000 in a sewing machine and basic supplies. She specialized in traditional Indian wear and gradually expanded to designer blouses.
tailoring.achievement: Opened her own boutique within 2 years and now employs 3 other women, generating ₹1.2 lakh monthly revenue.

cooking.name: Sunita Devi
cooking.story: Started a tiffin service from her kitchen, initially serving 10 office workers in her area. She focused on healthy, homemade meals with consistent quality and timing.
cooking.achievement: Expanded to serve 150+ customers daily across 3 office complexes, earning ₹60,000 monthly with help from 2 assistants.

cooking.name: Kavitha Reddy
cooking.story: Specialized in traditional Andhra pickles and snacks, starting by selling to neighbors and local stores. She maintained traditional recipes while ensuring proper packaging.
cooking.achievement: Products now sold in 25+ stores across the city with online orders, generating ₹80,000 monthly revenue.

handicrafts.name: Rekha Kumari
handicrafts.story: Learned traditional Rajasthani embroidery from her grandmother and started creating decorative items. She began selling at local craft fairs and tourist spots.
handicrafts.achievement: Established an online store with international customers, earning ₹35,000 monthly while preserving traditional art forms.

handicrafts.name: Anita Singh
handicrafts.story: Started making handmade paper products and eco-friendly items from her home. She focused on sustainable materials and unique designs for urban customers.
handicrafts.achievement: Supplies to 15+ retail stores and has a growing online presence, earning ₹42,000 monthly while promoting environmental consciousness.

tutoring.name: Dr. Rashmi Gupta
tutoring.story: Started tutoring mathematics to neighborhood children after completing her master's degree. She developed innovative teaching methods and maintained small batch sizes.
tutoring.achievement: Runs a coaching center with 80+ students, earning ₹75,000 monthly while helping students achieve academic excellence.

tutoring.name: Shalini Verma
tutoring.story: Began online English tutoring during the pandemic, focusing on spoken English and personality development for working professionals.
tutoring.achievement: Built a client base of 50+ professionals across India, earning ₹55,000 monthly through online sessions and courses.

beauty_services.name: Pooja Agarwal
beauty_services.story: Started with a basic beauty course and began offering services from home. She focused on bridal makeup and gradually built a portfolio through social media.
beauty_services.achievement: Established a home salon with regular clients and destination wedding bookings, earning ₹90,000 monthly during peak season.

beauty_services.name: Nisha Kapoor
beauty_services.story: Specialized in natural and organic beauty treatments, starting with friends and family. She emphasized chemical-free products and personalized care.
beauty_services.achievement: Opened a boutique spa focusing on organic treatments, serving 200+ clients monthly and earning ₹1.1 lakh.

online_business.name: Ritu Agarwal
online_business.story: Started an online store selling handmade jewelry and accessories. She learned digital marketing through free online courses and built her brand on social media.
online_business.achievement: Achieved ₹2 lakh monthly sales with customers across India and international orders, working entirely from home.

online_business.name: Deepika Joshi
online_business.story: Created online courses teaching traditional cooking to urban women. She started with free YouTube videos and gradually built a paid course platform.
online_business.achievement: Enrolled 500+ students in her courses, earning ₹65,000 monthly while preserving traditional cooking knowledge.

food_business.name: Lakshmi Iyer
food_business.story: Started a small South Indian restaurant focusing on authentic flavors and homestyle cooking. She began with a small space and gradually expanded the menu.
food_business.achievement: Restaurant serves 200+ customers daily with plans for a second location, generating ₹1.5 lakh monthly profit.

food_business.name: Geeta Sharma
food_business.story: Specialized in traditional Rajasthani sweets and snacks, starting with festival orders from neighbors and gradually expanding to regular production.
food_business.achievement: Supplies to 20+ sweet shops and has a thriving festival order business, earning ₹70,000 monthly.

boutique.name: Simran Kaur
boutique.story: Started with a small collection of ethnic wear, focusing on quality fabrics and unique designs. She began by selling to friends and at local exhibitions.
boutique.achievement: Opened a boutique store with online presence, serving customers across North India and earning ₹1.8 lakh monthly.

boutique.name: Anjali Mehta
boutique.story: Specialized in designer sarees and traditional wear, leveraging Surat's textile hub. She focused on wholesale and retail both.
boutique.achievement: Established supply chain with 50+ retailers and direct customers, generating ₹2.2 lakh monthly revenue.

daycare.name: Mamta Gupta
daycare.story: Started a home-based daycare for working parents in her society. She focused on early childhood education and nutritious meals for children.
daycare.achievement: Expanded to care for 25 children with 2 assistants, earning ₹85,000 monthly while providing essential community service.

daycare.name: Shanti Devi
daycare.story: Opened a daycare center focusing on Malayalam and English education for young children. She emphasized play-based learning and cultural values.
daycare.achievement: Serves 40+ families with a waiting list, earning ₹95,000 monthly while contributing to early childhood development.

event_planning.name: Neha Agarwal
event_planning.story: Started by organizing small family functions and gradually moved to wedding planning. She focused on traditional Rajasthani themes and cultural elements.
event_planning.achievement: Plans 15+ weddings annually with a team of 5, earning ₹3-4 lakh per event during wedding season.

event_planning.name: Priyanka Sharma
event_planning.story: Specialized in corporate events and product launches, starting with small business networking events. She built relationships with vendors and venues.
event_planning.achievement: Manages 50+ corporate events annually, earning ₹1.5 lakh monthly with potential for seasonal peaks.

jewelry_making.name: Kiran Patel
jewelry_making.story: Learned traditional jewelry making techniques and started creating silver jewelry with semi-precious stones. She began selling at local craft markets.
jewelry_making.achievement: Established online presence with international customers, earning ₹48,000 monthly while preserving traditional craftsmanship.

photography.name: Sneha Reddy
photography.story: Started with portrait photography for families and gradually expanded to wedding photography. She invested in quality equipment and built a strong portfolio.
photography.achievement: Books 20+ events monthly including weddings and corporate shoots, earning ₹1.2 lakh monthly during peak season.

catering.name: Usha Devi
catering.story: Started catering for small family functions, focusing on traditional vegetarian cuisine. She maintained consistent quality and timely service.
catering.achievement: Caters to 25+ events monthly with a team of 4, earning ₹85,000 monthly while serving the community.

home_bakery.name: Riya Jain
home_bakery.story: Started baking cakes for friends' birthdays and gradually expanded to custom cake orders. She focused on unique designs and natural ingredients.
home_bakery.achievement: Fulfills 40+ cake orders monthly with growing demand for custom designs, earning ₹52,000 monthly.

consulting.name: Kavya Nair
consulting.story: Used her MBA and corporate experience to start business consulting for small enterprises. She focused on helping women entrepreneurs with business planning.
consulting.achievement: Consults for 15+ businesses monthly, earning ₹78,000 while empowering other women entrepreneurs.
